attributes.action: Appoint Justin Haigh as the Poet Laureate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Appoint the Lyricist from the Doom Band Crawe as the Poet Laureate for his inciteful and influential lyrics which produce a thoughtful metaphore for Britains Commen Man

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
